root.name: Archeblade
root.description: OverviewArcheblade is a free-to-play MOBA using a behind-the-back third-person perspective, built by the Seoul-based developer Codebrush Games. The game is still in development, but is available on Steam as an open beta.Gameplay Characters System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP 32bitProcessor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.86 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHzMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: ATI HD3850, GTX250DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 1500 MB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connectionRecommendedOS: Windows 7 32/64bitProcessor: Intel Core i3 3GHz, AMD Phenom II X2 3GHzMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: ATI HD4870, GTX460DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 1500 MB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
